name: r19.28zv
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wral(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wral(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wral(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wral(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Restricted quantifier version of Theorem 19.28 of [Margaris] p. 90. It is valid only when the domain of quantification is not empty. (Contributed by NM, 19-Aug-2004.)
